(Unofficial) METER Price Ticker
Unofficial community built $MTRG price ticker extension for chrome

What does it do?
- Show current market price on the persistent ticker (default currency USD)
- Show prices in ETH/BTC/USD on click
- Show 24 hours % change, 7d% change and 30d %change

This currently uses the coingecko Open API to retrieve price data and ticker changes
